name: Slay the Creeps
description:
This is the first individual project from Game Development 1 in the Fall 2022 semester. This was my first time working with the Godot game engine, and I feel this project came out pretty well. In Godot, the first example project on the engine's website is a small game called "Dodge the Creeps". Thus, our goal for this project was to take this example game and make our own thing out of it.

So the root of my idea for this project was, "what if I take the character from dodge the creeps and give him a sword?", and that's precisely what I did. Instead of the player getting a higher score by surviving for as long as possible, the player now gains points by hitting enemies with a sword.

This project was cool because I made all the assets for this game. Pixel art, animations, and even music, though, I didn't make the text font used for the UI.

The controls for this game are pretty simple:

W - move up

A - move left

S - move down

D - move right

Spacebar - swing sword
